mean_en: feeling or showing thanks because somebody has done something kind for you or has done as you asked
sentence: Everyone was so grateful to the medical team that they lined the road, waving thankfully.
sentence_trans: 每个人都非常感谢医疗队。他们站在路边，满怀谢意地与医疗队员们挥手告别。
word_etyma: grate感激，高兴 + ful多…的 → grateful感谢的；愉快的
